The competitors are not only endangered with attacks by their co-racers, but also the Police, which does everything in its powers to stop those crazy races like Cannonball. The series starts in Tokyo and finishes in New York. During it the whole cavalcade of race cars will roll through the worldâs most beautiful spots. We, the Policemen, can not allow those madmen to roll over these beautiful locations, or create dangerous situations on the road. Stop WIS, by catching the most dangerous drivers. Grasp your radar gun and catch cars in new quality Tower Defense game.1. Japan â The competition takes place in the historic part of Tokyo. The country of the blossoming cherry tree is the first stage for World Illegal Series2.  China - The main attraction of this stage is the Great Wall of China. The race takes place not far from Beijing.3. Egypt â The pyramids and the Sphinx are the remains of the Great Egypt. 10.    Sahara â Sand, dunes, snakes and scorpions. 11.    Brazil â WIS moved to the damp terrains of the Amazon delta. The drivers  will become stuck in mud, sinking their vehicles while trying to ford rivers. 12.    Jamaica â The Caribbean are one of Worldâs most beautiful regions, commonly named the earthly heaven.13.    USA p1 Canyon â Donât let them run over one of the symbols of the USA. reviews.title: Glitch
reviews.comment: It wrecked out every time I opened it and it freezes when I place something down
reviews.author: Mike Renald

reviews.title: Slow and disappointing.
reviews.comment: For such a big-ish dload, I expected something with more effort put into it.  Played a few levels to see if it got any better... it does not.  It\'s just a very basic tower defence game with little to no effort put in. It\'s slow, the towers are all underwhelming and the game overall is just bland. I did not think it possible to make controls in a tower defence game bad as they are so basic, but this game manages to do just that.  It\'s an interesting concept I admit. It\'s just not been put together well at all. Needs massive improvements for a sequel. My advice to the developer... go play some of the better tower defence games and learn what makes them fun.  Give it a try, be disappointed, then uninstall and try one of the many other far better tower defence games out there instead.
reviews.author: Steve Perrin

reviews.title: Very bad game
reviews.comment: Very boring. The money system sucks everything in in 10000k or as they put it 0.5k for a tower
reviews.author: jason kidd

reviews.title: Piece of crap
reviews.comment: This game is very very poor in a lot of areas of gameplay...there is no intro to game hints tips or much of any help...BTW I don\'t need the developer to respond to this and this game needs help
reviews.author: Andrew Goodman

reviews.title: Game sucks and i havent played it
reviews.author: Miranda Bliven

reviews.title: Worst tower defense game ever & buggy menus
reviews.comment: On Galaxy S3:  When the game is loading, it displays distorted backgrounds that look like an old Nintendo game with a bad cartridge.  Game takes a really long time to load and the UI is very sluggish and doesn\'t register taps right away, making it very frustrating to navigate. When you tap a menu item, it can take up to 5 seconds for the app to respond.  Gameplay is not intuitive and there are no obvious instructions. And police cars shoot laser beams to destroy cars - seems counter-intuitive.  There is nothing about this game that would make me want to play it. The fewer than 15 minutes I spent in the app felt like a big waste of time.
reviews.author: Neil Smith

reviews.comment: Won\'t even let me download the game error everytime HTC one

reviews.comment: This game does need work, but that comes over time. I love tower defense games and this is a pretty cool concept with cars. Could use some polish (graphically) but for the first release, ill keep playing.
